definition: Ôn: Bị động (be + V3) với các thì; bị động với modal (can be done, must be done). Động từ khuyết thiếu: can, could, may, might, must, have to, should, ought to, would rather, had better. Phân biệt must vs have to, can vs be able to.

rows: S + be + V3 (by O). Các thì: is done, was done, will be done, has been done. Modal: can be done, must be done.
Can (ability, permission), Must (obligation), Should (advice), May/Might (possibility), Have to (external obligation).
Chuyển câu chủ động sang bị động. Điền modal phù hợp (can, must, should...).

usage: Bị động: chủ ngữ là người/vật chịu tác động.
Mustn't = cấm. Don't have to = không cần.
signals: Passive: be + V3. Modals: can, must, should, may, might.

title: Ôn tập tổng hợp 3 - Từ nối và Mệnh đề
definition: Ôn: Liên từ (and, but, because, although, when). Mệnh đề quan hệ (who, which, that, whose, whom, when, where, why). Defining vs non-defining. Câu phức với mệnh đề trạng ngữ (when, although, because...).

rows: And, but, or, so. Because, although, when, if. However, therefore, moreover.
Who, which, that (defining). Who, which, whose, whom, when, where, why. Non-defining (comma).
Nối hai câu bằng liên từ. Rút gọn bằng mệnh đề quan hệ (who, which).

usage: Mệnh đề phụ có thể đứng trước hoặc sau mệnh đề chính.
Defining: không dấu phẩy. Non-defining: dấu phẩy.
signals: Conjunctions. Relative clauses. Complex sentences.

title: Ôn tập tổng hợp 4 - Từ vựng và Collocation
definition: Ôn: Collocation (make/do/take + N). Phrasal verbs thường gặp (look, get, take, put, come). Thành ngữ (idioms). Phân biệt từ dễ nhầm (say/tell, make/do, borrow/lend, affect/effect, rise/raise).

rows: Make a decision, do homework, take a break. Heavy rain, strong coffee.
Look after, get over, take off, put off, come across. Learn by theme.
Say vs tell. Make vs do. Borrow vs lend. Affect vs effect.
Học cụm từ theo chủ đề. Đặt câu với phrasal verbs và idioms.

usage: Tra collocation khi nghi ngờ.
Phrasal verb: nghĩa thường khác động từ gốc.
signals: Collocations. Phrasal verbs. Confusing words.

title: Ôn tập tổng hợp 5 - Viết và Giao tiếp
definition: Ôn: Câu đơn/ghép/phức. Topic sentence và supporting sentences. Linking words (Firstly, However, In conclusion). Cách chào hỏi, xin lỗi, cảm ơn, đưa ý kiến, gợi ý. Formal vs informal. Skimming và scanning.

rows: Paragraph structure. Topic + supporting + concluding. Linking paragraphs.
Greetings, thanks, apologies. Giving opinion, suggesting. Agreeing, disagreeing. Polite requests.
Viết một đoạn văn có topic sentence và 2–3 supporting sentences.
Luyện hội thoại: cảm ơn, xin lỗi, đưa gợi ý.

usage: Viết: một đoạn một ý. Nói: dùng cụm lịch sự (Could you...? I'd appreciate...).
Đọc: skimming cho ý chính, scanning cho chi tiết.
signals: Writing: topic sentence, linking. Speaking: polite phrases. Reading: skimming, scanning.

title: Can và Be able to
definition: Can: khả năng hiện tại, xin phép. Be able to: dùng được mọi thì (was able to, will be able to, have been able to). Was able to = managed to (thành công làm trong quá khứ). Could = khả năng chung; was able to = thành công một lần.

rows: Mọi thì: He will be able to come. She has been able to work.
Could = khả năng chung quá khứ
Was/were able to = thành công trong tình huống cụ thể: I was able to fix it.
I couldn't sleep last night. (khả năng)
I was able to get tickets. (thành công mua được vé)

usage: Could không dùng cho thành công một lần trong quá khứ (He could leave yesterday → sai; He was able to leave.).
Be able to dùng khi can không có (future, perfect, infinitive: would like to be able to).
signals: Can (present). Be able to (all tenses). Was able to = succeeded.

title: Yêu cầu, Đề nghị, Lời mời
definition: Request: Could you...? Would you mind...? Offer: Shall I...? Would you like me to...? I can... if you like. Invitation: Would you like to...? Do you want to...? How about...? Accept: Yes, please. I'd love to. Decline: I'd love to but... I'm afraid I can't.

rows: Could you open the window? Would you mind...?
Shall I help you? I can do it for you.
Would you like me to call back?
Would you like to come? How about dinner?
— Would you like tea? — Yes, please. / No, thank you.
— Shall I wait? — Yes, please. / No, it's OK.

usage: Would you like + N (mời dùng gì). Would you like to + V (mời làm gì).
Shall I/we...? = đề nghị làm (cho mình/cho nhau).
signals: Could you...? Shall I...? Would you like to...?

title: Hỏi lại và Làm rõ
definition: Khi không nghe rõ: Sorry? Pardon? Could you repeat that? What did you say? Khi không hiểu: What do you mean? Could you explain? I don't get it. Can you give me an example? Làm rõ ý: I mean... What I mean is... In other words,...

rows: Sorry? Pardon (me)? Could you say that again? I didn't catch that.
What do you mean (by...)? Could you explain? I'm not sure I follow.
I mean... What I mean is... To put it another way,...
— We need to leverage it. — What do you mean by 'leverage'?
I mean we should use it to our advantage.

usage: Pardon? (Anh-Anh). Sorry? (thân mật).
Could you run that by me again? (informal).
signals: Sorry? What do you mean? I mean...

title: Bày tỏ ngạc nhiên và Quan tâm
definition: Ngạc nhiên: Really? Wow! I can't believe it! That's amazing! No way! Are you serious? Quan tâm: That's interesting. Tell me more. I see. Oh, I didn't know that. Showing you're listening: I see. Right. Uh-huh. Go on.

rows: That's interesting. Tell me more. I see.
I can't believe it! Are you serious?
Right. Uh-huh. Go on. What happened then?
— I won the lottery. — No way! Really?
— So then he left. — Oh, I see. What did you do?

usage: No way = không thể nào (ngạc nhiên hoặc từ chối).
I see = tôi hiểu (đang lắng nghe).
signals: Really? No way! That's interesting. Tell me more.

title: Giới từ chỉ chuyển động
definition: To: đến (đích). Into: vào trong. Out of: ra khỏi. Onto: lên trên. Off: xuống khỏi. Through: xuyên qua. Across: băng qua (bề mặt). Along: dọc theo. Towards: về phía. Up/Down: lên/xuống.

rows: Go to the station. Come to my house.
Go into the room. Get into the car.
Get out of the car. Take it out of the box.
Walk through the park. Drive through the tunnel.
Walk across the street. Swim across the river.
She ran towards me. He climbed up the stairs. The ball rolled down the hill.

usage: Into = movement inside. In = position inside.
Onto = lên trên bề mặt. On = vị trí trên.
signals: To, into, out of, through, across, along, towards.

title: Một số giới từ thường gặp khác
definition: By: bởi (bị động); trước (by Monday); bằng phương tiện (by car). With: với (cùng, bằng công cụ). Without: không có. About: về. For: cho; trong (for 2 hours). Of: của. From: từ. Between: giữa 2. Among: giữa nhiều.

rows: Made by hand. By 5pm. Travel by train.
I live with my family. Cut with a knife.
I can't do it without you. Coffee without sugar.
Between you and me. Between 9 and 10.
Among the students. Choose among the options.
The book was written by him. We need it by Friday.
It's between the bank and the post office.

usage: Between + 2. Among + 3 or more.
By + time = trước (hoàn thành trước thời điểm).
signals: By, with, without, about, for, between, among.

title: Thứ tự tính từ - Order of Adjectives
definition: Thứ tự thường gặp: Opinion (đẹp) → Size → Age → Shape → Color → Origin → Material → Purpose + Noun. Ví dụ: a beautiful small old round red Italian leather handbag. Trong thực tế ít khi dùng quá 3–4 tính từ.

rows: a nice big old house. a small red plastic bag.

usage: Ghi nhớ: OSAShCOMP (Opinion, Size, Age, Shape, color, Origin, Material, Purpose).
Thực tế: 2–3 tính từ là đủ.
signals: Opinion → Size → Age → Shape → Color → Origin → Material.

title: Trạng từ tần suất - Vị trí chi tiết
definition: Always, usually, often, sometimes, rarely, seldom, never. Vị trí: sau be (am/is/are/was/were); trước động từ thường; giữa trợ ĐT và động từ chính (have always been). Đặt đầu câu để nhấn mạnh: Sometimes I eat out. Never have I seen... (đảo ngữ).

rows: She is always late. He was never happy there.
I always go to bed early. She never lies.
I have always wanted to go. She will never forget.
Sometimes I skip breakfast. Often we meet on Fridays.
He doesn't always agree. (sau trợ ĐT phủ định)
Rarely do I eat fast food. (đảo ngữ)

usage: 100%: always. 0%: never. Giữa: usually, often, sometimes, rarely.
Seldom, rarely, never đứng đầu câu → đảo ngữ (Rarely did he complain).
signals: After be. Before main V. Between aux and V. Never/Rarely at start → inversion.

title: Still, Already, Yet - Ôn và mở rộng
definition: Already: đã (khẳng định; có thể đặt cuối câu: I've done it already). Yet: chưa (phủ định, câu hỏi; cuối câu). Still: vẫn (đang tiếp tục). Still trong câu phủ định = vẫn chưa (hơi bực). Any more: không còn nữa.

rows: Giữa have/has và V3; hoặc cuối
I've already eaten. She's left already.
Have you finished yet? Not yet.
I'm still waiting. She still works here.
He still hasn't called. (vẫn chưa gọi – bực)
I don't live there any more. (không còn sống ở đó)

usage: Already trong câu hỏi: ngạc nhiên (You've finished already?).
Yet chỉ dùng trong phủ định và nghi vấn (chưa).
signals: Already (done). Yet (not yet). Still (continuing). Any more (no longer).

title: Even if và Even though
definition: Even though: mặc dù (sự thật đã biết). Even if: ngay cả khi (giả định, có thể không đúng). Even though it's expensive, I'll buy it. (Nó đắt – sự thật.) Even if it's expensive, I'll buy it. (Giả sử nó đắt – có thể không.)

rows: Even though it was raining, we went out. (Trời đang mưa.)
Even if it rains, we'll go. (Giả sử trời mưa.)
I'll help you even if you don't ask. (ngay cả khi bạn không nhờ)
Even though he tried hard, he failed. (anh ấy đã cố – sự thật)

usage: Even though = although (stronger). Even if = whether or not.
Even if có thể là điều kiện chưa xảy ra hoặc không chắc.
signals: Even though = fact. Even if = hypothesis.

title: Whether và If - Phân biệt
definition: If: điều kiện (If it rains...) hoặc có thể (I don't know if he will come). Whether: sau động từ (know, wonder, ask, decide) khi có 2 lựa chọn; sau giới từ; trước to V. I don't know whether/if he's coming. We discussed whether to go. (sau discuss dùng whether).

rows: We discussed whether to leave. It depends on whether he agrees.
I don't know whether to go or stay.
It's a question of whether we can afford it.
I'll go if you go. If it rains, I'll stay.
Tell me whether (or not) you're coming. (whether thường dùng với or not)
I wonder if/whether she knows. (cả hai được)

usage: Whether or not = có... hay không. If không dùng sau giới từ.
Sau know, wonder, ask: if và whether đều được.
signals: Whether: after discuss, depend, preposition, before to V. If: condition.

title: Unless, As long as, Provided that
definition: Unless = if not: trừ khi. Unless you hurry, you'll be late. = If you don't hurry, you'll be late. As long as / So long as / Providing (that) / Provided (that): miễn là (điều kiện). I'll come as long as you invite me.

rows: Unless you apologize, I won't talk to you.
You can stay as long as you're quiet.
You can go provided (that) you finish the work.
Unless it rains, we'll have a picnic. (If it doesn't rain...)
I'll help you as long as you tell the truth.

usage: Unless + positive verb = if + negative. (Unless you go = If you don't go.)
As long as = on condition that.
signals: Unless = if not. As long as = provided that = miễn là.

title: Despite, Although, Though - So sánh
definition: Although / Though + clause (S + V). Despite / In spite of + N / V-ing (không phải clause). Though có thể đứng cuối câu (informal): It was hard. I did it, though. Even though nhấn mạnh hơn although.

rows: Although it was cold, we went out. Though I tried, I failed.
Despite the cold, we went out. In spite of feeling tired, she continued.
It's expensive. I'll buy it, though.
Even though he's rich, he's not happy. (nhấn mạnh)
Despite having no experience, she got the job.

usage: Though = although (informal hơn).
Despite the fact that + clause = Although (formal).
signals: Although + clause. Despite + N/V-ing. Though at end = however.

title: So...that và Such...that - Ôn
definition: So + adj/adv + that. Such + (a/an) + adj + N + that. So many/few + N (plural) + that. So much/little + N (uncountable) + that. Such a lot of + N. It was so cold that we stayed in. It was such a cold day that we stayed in.

rows: She was so tired that she fell asleep.
It was such a nice day that we went out.
There were so many people that we couldn't move.
There was so little time that we had to run.
He spoke so quickly that I couldn't understand.
She's such a good teacher that everyone likes her.

usage: So + adj (không có N). Such + (a/an) + adj + N.
So many/much + N. Such a lot of + N.
signals: So + adj/adv. Such + (a/an) + adj + N. So many/much.

title: So sánh - As...as và Than
definition: As + adj/adv + as: bằng. Not as/so...as: không bằng. So sánh hơn: adj-er + than / more + adj + than. So sánh nhất: the + adj-est / the most + adj. So sánh kép: The more..., the more... As much/many + N + as.

rows: She's as tall as me. He runs as fast as you.
She's taller than me. More expensive than...
She's the tallest. The most expensive.
The more you practice, the better you get.
This is not as good as that. I have as many books as you.

usage: Sau than: me (informal) hoặc I (formal: She's taller than I am).
As...as dùng trong so sánh bằng; than dùng trong so sánh hơn.
signals: As...as. -er/more + than. The -est / the most.

title: Danh từ đếm được và không đếm được - Chi tiết
definition: Đếm được: a book, two books; dùng many, few, a number of. Không đếm được: water, rice, information; không dùng a/an; dùng much, little, amount of. Một số vừa đếm được vừa không: coffee (uncountable) vs a coffee (cốc cà phê). Hair (tóc) thường U; a hair = sợi tóc.

rows: a book, an apple, many books, few ideas
How much? An amount of. A piece of advice.
I'd like a coffee. (= a cup of coffee)

usage: Advice, information, furniture, news: không đếm được (không có -s).
A piece of advice, a piece of information, a piece of furniture.
signals: Countable: a/an, many, few. Uncountable: no a/an, much, little.

title: Danh từ ghép - Compound Nouns
definition: Danh từ ghép = 2+ từ tạo thành 1 danh từ. Có thể: N+N (toothbrush, football), Adj+N (blackboard), V-ing+N (swimming pool), N+V-ing (sunrise). Số nhiều thường thêm -s vào từ chính: toothbrushes, not teethbrush. Một số có dấu gạch nối: mother-in-law → mothers-in-law.

rows: swimming pool, washing machine, dining room

usage: Stress thường ở từ đầu: 'blackboard, 'swimming pool.
Một số viết liền, một số có gạch nối (check dictionary).
signals: N+N, Adj+N, V-ing+N. Plural on main noun.

title: Tiền tố phủ định - Negative Prefixes
definition: Un-: unhappy, unable, unfair. In-: incorrect, invisible (trước không phải l, r). Im-: impossible, immature (trước p, m). Il-: illegal (trước l). Ir-: irregular, irresponsible (trước r). Dis-: disagree, disappear. Non-: non-stop, non-fiction.

rows: In- không dùng trước l, r: illegal, irregular.
Un- phổ biến: unkind, unlock, unhappy.

usage: Một số từ không theo quy tắc: informal, impatient (im-).
Tra từ điển khi không chắc.
signals: Un-, In-, Im-, Il-, Ir-, Dis-. In- not before l, r.

title: Hậu tố tạo động từ và danh từ
definition: V → N: -tion (action), -sion (decision), -ment (development), -er (teacher), -ation (information). Adj → N: -ness (happiness), -ity (ability). N/Adj → V: -ize (modernize), -en (widen, strengthen), -ify (simplify).

rows: Simple → simplify. Clear → clarify. Identity → identify.

usage: -tion sau V (invent → invention). -ness sau adj (kind → kindness).
-ize (Anh-Mỹ), -ise (Anh-Anh): organize/organise.
signals: -tion, -ment, -ness. -ize, -en, -ify.

title: Viết email trang trọng
definition: Mở đầu: Dear Mr/Ms/Mrs + surname. Lý do viết: I am writing to... / I would like to inquire about... Nội dung: đoạn ngắn, rõ ràng. Kết thúc: I look forward to hearing from you. Yours sincerely (khi biết tên) / Yours faithfully (khi không biết). Sign off: Best regards, [Name].

rows: Dear Mr Smith, / Dear Sir or Madam,
I am writing to inquire about... / I am writing in response to...
Đoạn ngắn, câu đầy đủ. Please find attached... Could you please...?
I look forward to your reply. Please do not hesitate to contact me if...
Yours sincerely, (biết tên) / Yours faithfully, (không biết)
Dear Mr Brown, I am writing to apply for the position of... I look forward to hearing from you. Yours sincerely, John Smith.

usage: Tránh viết tắt (I'm → I am). Tránh từ quá thân mật.
Yours sincerely khi bắt đầu Dear Mr X. Yours faithfully khi Dear Sir/Madam.
signals: Dear... I am writing to... Yours sincerely/faithfully.

title: Viết email thân mật
definition: Mở đầu: Hi [Name], Hello, Hey. Thân mật: Thanks for... Just wanted to... I'm writing to... Kết: See you soon. Take care. Bye. Best, [Name]. Có thể dùng viết tắt (I'm, don't, we'll). Câu ngắn, thoải mái.

rows: Thanks for your email. Just wanted to let you know... I'm writing because...
See you soon! Take care. Talk later. Bye! Best, / Cheers,
Hi Anna, Thanks for the invite! I'd love to come. See you on Saturday. Best, Mike.

usage: Viết tắt OK: I'm, we'll, don't. Emoji tùy người nhận.
Cheers (Anh-Anh) = Thanks / Bye.
signals: Hi... Thanks for... See you. Best/Cheers.

title: Mẹo nghe hiểu
definition: Trước khi nghe: đọc câu hỏi, đoán chủ đề, từ khóa. Trong khi nghe: nghe từ khóa, không cố nghe từng từ, chấp nhận bỏ qua. Sau khi nghe: kiểm tra chính tả, số ít/số nhiều. Luyện: nghe nhiều lần, transcript, podcast, phim phụ đề.

rows: Đọc câu hỏi. Đoán chủ đề. Gạch chân từ khóa.
Tập trung vào ý chính. Ghi chú số, tên. Không dừng lại khi miss.
Kiểm tra chính tả. Số ít/số nhiều. Điền đủ từ theo yêu cầu.
Nghe podcast, TED. Xem phim với phụ đề tiếng Anh. Nghe lại + đọc transcript.

usage: Keyword listening: không cần hiểu hết.
Chấp nhận miss một phần, bắt kịp phần sau.
signals: Preview questions. Focus on key words. Check spelling.

title: Phát âm đuôi -ed (V-ed)
definition: Đuôi -ed phát âm: /t/ khi động từ tận cùng âm vô thanh (p, k, f, s, sh, ch, x): looked, stopped. /d/ khi tận cùng âm hữu thanh (còn lại): played, lived. /ɪd/ khi tận cùng /t/ hoặc /d/: wanted, needed.

rows: Âm cuối vô thanh (p, k, f, s, sh, ch)

usage: Âm vô thanh: không rung cổ họng (p, t, k, f, s, sh, ch).
Hữu thanh: rung (b, d, g, v, z, m, n, l, r...).
signals: -ed: /t/ (voiceless), /d/ (voiced), /ɪd/ (after t, d).

title: Phát âm đuôi -s/-es
definition: Số nhiều N và ngôi 3 số ít V: /s/ sau âm vô thanh (cats, works). /z/ sau âm hữu thanh (dogs, lives). /ɪz/ sau âm xuýt (s, z, sh, ch, ge): buses, watches, boxes.

rows: Sau s, z, sh, ch, ge, x

usage: Thêm -es khi N/V tận cùng s, x, z, ch, sh: box → boxes.
Phát âm /ɪz/ = thêm âm tiết.
signals: -s/-es: /s/ (voiceless), /z/ (voiced), /ɪz/ (after sibilant).

title: Mở rộng 1 - Cụm từ hữu ích
definition: At the end of the day: cuối cùng thì. To be honest: thành thật mà nói. As a matter of fact: thực ra. To cut a long story short: nói tóm lại. Having said that: tuy vậy. To some extent: ở mức độ nào đó. In terms of: về mặt. It goes without saying: không cần nói.

rows: at the end of the day
At the end of the day, it's your decision.
To be honest, I didn't like it.
It's cheap. Having said that, the quality is poor.
In terms of cost, it's good.
To cut a long story short, we missed the flight.
It goes without saying that we need to prepare.

usage: Dùng để nối ý, chuyển ý trong nói và viết.
To be honest, Having said that: rất thường gặp.
signals: At the end of the day. To be honest. In terms of. Having said that.

title: Mở rộng 2 - Cấu trúc hữu ích
definition: It's (high) time + S + V2: đã đến lúc (nên làm). Would rather + S + V2: muốn ai đó làm (hiện tại). Would prefer + N + to V: thích ai đó làm. Had better + V: nên (cảnh báo). Would you mind + V-ing: bạn có phiền... I'd appreciate it if + S + V2: tôi biết ơn nếu...

rows: It's time we left. It's high time you found a job.
I'd rather you didn't tell anyone.
I'd appreciate it if you could reply soon.
Would you mind closing the window?
It's high time you apologized. (đã đến lúc nên xin lỗi)
I'd appreciate it if you could send the file today.

usage: It's time we left (lùi thì: left, không leave).
Would you mind...? Đáp No = đồng ý (No, not at all.).
signals: It's time S + V2. I'd appreciate it if. Would you mind V-ing?
